name: Northestbound
description:
Links to previous games: 

1. https://levgames.itch.io/northbound

2. https://levgames.itch.io/northernbound

-Overview-

Northestbound the last entry of the trilogy of adventure JRPG made for various (You)RPGM GameJam. This entry is not as polished as the last one but I really felt like giving this series one last adventure, one last trip, one last drink. 

-Story-

Svend is stranded in another world after entering the portal at the end of their last adventure.  After many travels, many worlds, he lost hope on finding his old friends and decided that drinking is the best option for now. A new friend will bring back hope in him, and venture on a quest to find his friends.

Music: https://sonatina.itch.io/letsadventure
